casebody.data:
No. 549,

Misc.

Porter v. Aetna Casualty & Surety Co. Ethelbert B. Frey for petitioner. John L. Laskey for respondent. Solicitor General Cox and Assistant Attorney General Orrick filed a memorandum for the United States, as amicus curiae, in support of the petition.

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit granted. Case transferred to appellate docket.
